C3_Stratagems: Eagle Airstrike, Frag Grenades, Orbital Precision; Incendiary Strike; avoid gas vs bugs

C4_Armor_boosters: Light/Medium; Revive Speed; consider Heavy Armor on higher tiers
C4_Stratagems: Reinforce Beacon, Stim/Heal, Emergency Supply; Incendiary Strike; avoid gas vs bugs

C5_Stratagems: UAV Recon Drone, Motion Sensor, Flares; Incendiary Strike; avoid gas vs bugs

C6_Stratagems: MG Sentry, Incendiary Bombs, Static Shield Wall
